name: Queen Uv
greetingText:
♥ On this Valentine’s Day, I want to let you know how much you mean to me. 
  You’re like a precious, priceless jewel. I’m so thankful I’ve found you!
wishText:
I can’t stop loving you because it’s the only thing I’m good at and 
  the only reason I was sent here on earth. I love you! Wishing you a happy valentine!
